content: a simple affair designed by melissa clulow / sonder yarn co sonder yarn co | sonderyarnco com | @sonderyarnco | #sonderyarnco a simple affair | page 2 sizes lace + lace fingering + lace finished dimensions wingspan 76 83 / 193 211 cm center depth 23 25 / 58 5 63 5 cm yarn lace + lace version sonder yarn co haven 75% falkland merino 12 5% bluefaced leicester 12 5% masham 711 yds 650m / 100g 1 skein - shown in an affair to remember or approximately 711 y 650 m of a similar laceweight yarn sonder yarn co halo 72% mohair 28% silk 459 yds 420m / 50g 2 skeins shown in siren or approximately 711 yds 650 m of fluffy lace weight yarn fingering + lace version sonder yarn co sunday morning 4 ply 75% bluefaced leicester 25% masham 432 yds 395m / 100g 2 skeins - shown in dirty weekend or approximately 760 yds 695 m of a similar fingering weight yarn sonder yarn co halo 72% mohair 28% silk 459 yds 420m / 50g 2 skeins shown in dirty weekend or approximately 760 yds 695 m of fluffy lace weight yarn needles lace + lace version 4 5 mm us 7 32 / 80 cm circular knitting needles fingering + lace version 5 mm us 8 32 / 80 cm circular knitting needles notions 2 stitch markers tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge 19 17 sts & 33 30 row per 4 /10cm measured in garter stitch after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements be sure to swatch and use the needle size required to achieve gauge © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only a simple affair | page 3 pattern note instructions for both sizes are the same it is only the gauge that differs using circular needle and a strand each of two lace weight yarns or fingering weight + lace for larger version co 5 sts row 1 rs kfb kfb pm kfb kfb k1 9 sts row 2 ws kfb knit to last 2 stitches kfb k1 11 sts row 3 rs kfb knit to 1 stitch before marker kfb sm kfb knit to last 2 stitches kfb k1 4 sts increased row 4 ws kfb knit to last 2 stitches kfb k1 2 sts increased repeat row 3 and 4 12 more times 89 sts eyelet row rs kfb k5 k2tog yo twice *k4 k2tog yo twice repeat from * to 6 sts before marker k5 kfb sm kfb k5 *yo twice k2tog k4 repeat from * to 9 sts before end yo twice k2tog k5 kfb k1 next row ws kfb knit to last 2 stitches knitting one stitch into double yo and dropping the extra loop kfb k1 95 sts repeat row 3 and 4 - 13 times 173 sts eyelet row rs kfb k5 k2tog yo twice *k4 k2tog yo twice repeat from * to 6 sts
